tool.name: NCBI Datasets Genomes
tool.description: import data from the NCBI Datasets Genomes page
tool.command: ## If running in container use certificate from ca-certificates instead of outdated / missing container certificates [ -f /usr/local/ssl/cacert.pem ] && export SSL_CERT_FILE="/usr/local/ssl/cacert.pem"; datasets download --input-json '$file_param' --filename '$compressed_archive' --no-progressbar && unzip -l '$compressed_archive'

inputs.display: go to NCBI Datasets Genomes server $GALAXY_URL
